channel.title: Logic on Truthmaker Semantics
channel.description: Recent content in Logic on Truthmaker Semantics

item.title: Applications
item.description: Unpublished Two-Dimensional Truthmaker Semantics Hasen Khudairi Extends the framework of exact truthmaker semantics with the resources of two-dimensional semantics. Keywords: philosophy modality logic Unpublished manuscript https://philarchive.org/archive/KHUTTS-2 Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: conditionals exact truthmaking applications Unpublished manuscript https://www.

item.title: Conditionals
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: exact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics Or-to-if Inferences in Contextualist Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Discusses or-to-if inferences in the semantics developed in (Güngör 2017 and 2019c). Keywords: exact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://www.

item.title: Exact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: conditionals Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics The Whole Truth Stephan Krämer Formulates an account of what it means to give the “whole truth” and formally models it in exact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: philosophy language applications logic In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.

item.title: Inexact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: conditionals exact truthmaking inexact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics Or-to-if Inferences in Contextualist Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Discusses or-to-if inferences in the semantics developed in (Güngör 2017 and 2019c). Keywords: exact truthmaking conditionals inexact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://www.
